title: Inside Out
short_plot_summary: A young girl's emotions are brought to life as characters in her mind, guiding her through a significant move to a new city. Along the way, they must navigate the challenges and changes that come with growing up.
explanation: The young girl, Riley, who is the main character and whose emotions are personified
A brain, representing the inner workings of Riley's mind and the setting for much of the movie
Joy, one of the main emotions and characters in the movie
Sadness, another important emotion and character in the story
Anger, one of the girl's emotions that plays a role in the movie
